text: The Adventures of Pinocchio is an 1883 novel by Carlo Collodi. The Adventures of Pinocchio may also refer to: ==Film and TV== {{#ifeq:{}|music|| * The Adventures of Pinocchio (1936 film), an unfinished Italian animated feature film * The Adventures of Pinocchio (1972 miniseries), an Italian miniseries * The Adventures of Pinocchio (1972 film), an animated adaptation from Cartoons Cinematografica Italiana * Mokku of the Oak Tree or Saban's Adventures of Pinocchio, a 1972 Japanese TV series * Piccolino no Bōken or The Adventures of Pinocchio, a 1976 Japanese/German TV series * The Adventures of Pinocchio (1984 film), an American animated feature film by Ippei Kuri and Jim Terry * The Adventures of Pinocchio (1996 film) a live-action British adaptation from Steve Barron }} ==Music== {{#ifeq:{}|music| * The Adventures of Pinocchio (opera), a 2007 English-language opera by Jonathan Dove * Pinocchio (Boesmans), French-language opera 2017 * The Adventures of Pinocchio, a 2009 composition Lior Navok }} ==See also== * The New Adventures of Pinocchio (disambiguation) * Pinocchio (1940 film) * Pinocchio (disambiguation)
title: The Adventures of Pinocchio (disambiguation)
